pkgmetadata.longdescription: Flexible Marginalized Models for Binary Correlated Outcomes // Estimates marginalized mean and dependence model parameters for correlated binary response data. Dependence model may include transition and/or latent variable terms. Methods are described in: Schildcrout and Heagerty (2007) doi:10.1111/j.1541-0420.2006.00680.x, Heagerty (1999) doi:10.1111/j.0006-341x.1999.00688.x, Heagerty (2002) doi:10.1111/j.0006-341x.2002.00342.x.
